SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Capsule
Represents a knowledge capsule.
Colaborator
The Colaborator class represents a collaborator and contains information about their status and name.
ControllerPro
The `ControllerPro` class is responsible for managing projects and capsules.
Main
The Main class provides the main menu for the user interface of the program.
Manager
Represents a manager with a name and cellphone number.
Project
The Project class represents a project with its attributes, including the project name, start date, end date, budget, client manager, manager, and stages.
Stage
Represents a stage in a project.
